home.text2: To publish stickers to the Status Sticker Market, first connect your Ethereum wallet.

new.title: New sticker pack
new.upload-stickers: Drag or click to upload stickers
new.upload-banner: Drag or click to upload banner
new.upload-thumbnail: Drag or click to upload thumbnail
new.meta-address: Ethereum address or ENS domain to receive SNT
new.meta-limit-installs-tooltip: If you want to create scarcity to your pack you can limit how many users can install it in Status.
new.meta-contribution: Contribution to Status Network from sales
new.meta-contribution-tooltip: All contributions go to the team working on and maintaining the Sticker Market.
new.stckers-description6: Please follow the guidelines of our
new.banner-description1: A good banner showcases your stickers, helping your pack to stand out.
new.thumbnail-description1: The thumbnail is used primarily to identify your pack in the menu once purchased.
